column5: Filled with uniqueness and good vibes the place allows guests to feel welcome and relax. Place has 3 bedrooms, 2.5 baths, gas fireplace, outside patio with pergola. Situated 8miles/15min drive from Downtown, and 5-10min drive to rests, shopping mall.  My place is close to family-friendly activities, the city center, and public transport.
